author: DP Bhattacharya
title: Migrant workers from R'than walk home from Ahmedabad
description: Migrant workers from R'than walk home from AhmedabadAs the lockdown to contain the spread of coronavirus infection widens in the state, thousands of migrant labourers who work in Ahmedabad, have taken the road to reach their homes in the southern districts of…
content:
Nana Chiloda, Gandhinagar: At first sight they look like any other group of pilgrims, probably walking down to a temple, a common sight along the highways in Gujarat. But they are not.
As the lockdown to contain the spread of coronavirus infection widens in … [+1424 chars]
